game.name: Spooky Bonus
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Uncover dark forces emanating from the heart of Old Town, and grab spooky accessories for your front yard makeover, too! You’ll be spellbound by this adorably ghoulish horror-themed puzzle game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Uncover dark forces emanating from the heart of Old Town, and grab spooky accessories for your front yard makeover, too! You’ll be spellbound by this adorably ghoulish horror-themed puzzle game.

reviewHighlights.text: I loved this game! All of it: the gothic theme, the match 3 game is a nice relaxing game to do (I prefer not to use the timer in the game. For me, no...
Great game that is a lot of fun and relaxing to play
